items.title: F&O Alert: FIIs net sell 3.5 lakh Nifty, Bank Nifty futures in just 3 days
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 08: FIIs turn bearish on Indian stocks, long-short ratio in index futures dipped below 1 for the first time since August 14. Retail and proprietary trades turn bullish.

items.title: JLR's disappointing September quarter update drags Tata Motors share 4%
items.description: The decline in Tata Motors share came on the back of disappointing sales figures for Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) in the September quarter (Q2FY25).

items.title: Nykaa's share price falls despite strong Q2 update; check details here
items.description: Shares of FSN E-Commerce Ventures, parent of e-commerce brand Nykaa dropped as much as 2.65 per cent a piece on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade

items.title: Indian bond yields expected to inch up as 10 year US yield tops 4%
items.description: Expectations of a 25 bps cut in November are at 88 per cent, while bets of no cut rose to 12 per cent from less than 10 per cent a day ago

items.description: Absolute-return investors must avoid Indian markets in the backdrop of recent developments, especially the stimulus by China, suggests a report by BCA Research

items.title: Weak Q2 sales pushes Sobha share price 4% lower on October 8
items.description: Sobha's new sales plunged 44.9 per cent year-on-year (Y-o-Y) to 929,907 square feet in Q2FY25, from 1,686,196 square feet in Q2FY24.

items.title: Zinka Logistics gets Sebi nod for Rs 550-cr IPO; key details for investors
items.description: Through the IPO, Zinka Logistics is offering a fresh issue of shares of up to Rs 550 crore and an offer for sale of up to 21.61 million equity shares, with a face value of Re 1 apiece

items.title: PSP Projects share rises over 5% on securing order worth Rs 270 crore
items.description: The uptick in PSP Projects share price came after the company announced that it has bagged an order worth Rs 270 crore from domestic entities.
